query.query: {"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceCase>\";q  = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"Current\").asDateRange(\"date('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month','ClosedDate_Day')\")}}; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == \"true\" ;hasArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' > 0;hasArticle = group hasArticle by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"saqlgroup\").asObject()}};hasArticle = foreach hasArticle generate \"With Articles\" as 'Cases',  avg('DurationCalculatedField') as 'avg_DurationCalculatedField', {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"query2\").asObject()}};noArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' == 0;noArticle = group noArticle by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"saqlgroup\").asObject()}};noArticle = foreach noArticle generate \"Without Articles\" as 'Cases',  avg('DurationCalculatedField') as 'avg_DurationCalculatedField',  {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"query2\").asObject()}};u = union hasArticle, noArticle;u = foreach u generate 'Cases' as 'Cases', 'avg_DurationCalculatedField' as 'avg_DurationCalculatedField2',{{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"order\").asObject()}} as {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"order\").asObject()}}; u = order u by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"order\").asObject()}};","measures":[["count","*","avg_DurationCalculatedField2"]],"autoFilter":true,"groups":["{{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"compactgroup\").asObject()}}","Cases"]}

step_ValuesTable_alt.query: q = load "<ServiceCase>"; q = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month','ClosedDate_Day')")}}; q = filter q by {{cell(Toggle_AttachedArticles.selection, 0, "saql").asObject()}}; q = foreach q generate 'CaseNumber', first('Account.Name') as 'Account.Name',  first('First_Contact_Close__c') as 'First_Contact_Close__c', first('Type') as 'Type', first('Owner.Name') as 'Owner.Name', first('MilestoneStatus') as 'MilestoneStatus', sum('DurationCalculatedField') as 'sum_DurationCalculatedField', first('IsEscalated') as 'IsEscalated', first('Origin') as 'Origin', first('Priority') as 'Priority', first('Status') as 'Status', first('Type_of_Support__c') as 'Type_of_Support__c', first('IsEscalated') as 'Escalated'; q = limit q 100;

query.query: {"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceCase>\"; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == \"true\" ; q = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"Current\").asDateRange(\"date('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month','ClosedDate_Day')\")}};  hasArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' > 0;  c = group hasArticle by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"saqlgroup\").asObject()}}, q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"saqlgroup\").asObject()}}; c = foreach c generate count(hasArticle)/count(q) as 'avg_AttachedRate', {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"query\").asObject()}}; c = group c by all; c = foreach c generate avg('avg_AttachedRate') as 'avg_AttachedRate';","measures":[["count","*","avg_AttachedRate"]],"autoFilter":true,"groups":["{{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"compactgroup\").asObject()}}"]}

{"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceCase>\";\n q = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"Current\").asDateRange(\"date('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month','ClosedDate_Day')\")}}; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == \"true\"; hasArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' > 0;  c = group hasArticle by 'Owner.Name', q by 'Owner.Name'; c = foreach c generate count(hasArticle)/count(q)  as 'avg_AttachedRate', hasArticle['Owner.Name'] as 'Owner.Name'; c = order c by 'avg_AttachedRate' {{cell(static_1.selection, 0, \"value\").asString()}};","measures":[["count","*","avg_AttachedRate"]],"measuresMap":{},"autoFilter":true,"groups":["Owner.Name"]}

{"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceCase>\"; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == \"true\" ; q = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"Current\").asDateRange(\"date('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month','ClosedDate_Day')\")}};  hasArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' > 0;  c = group hasArticle by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"saqlgroup\").asObject()}}, q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"saqlgroup\").asObject()}}; c = foreach c generate count(hasArticle)/count(q) as 'avg_AttachedRate', {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"query\").asObject()}};","measures":[["count","*","avg_AttachedRate"]],"autoFilter":true,"groups":["{{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"compactgroup\").asObject()}}"]}

{"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceCase>\";q  = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"Current\").asDateRange(\"date('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month','ClosedDate_Day')\")}}; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == \"true\" ;hasArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' > 0;hasArticle = group hasArticle by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"saqlgroup\").asObject()}};hasArticle = foreach hasArticle generate \"With Articles\" as 'Cases',  avg('DurationCalculatedField') as 'avg_DurationCalculatedField', {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"query2\").asObject()}};noArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' == 0;noArticle = group noArticle by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"saqlgroup\").asObject()}};noArticle = foreach noArticle generate \"Without Articles\" as 'Cases',  avg('DurationCalculatedField') as 'avg_DurationCalculatedField',  {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"query2\").asObject()}};u = union hasArticle, noArticle;u = order u by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"order\").asObject()}};q2 = filter q by CSAT > -10;hasArticle2 = filter q2 by 'ArticleVersion' > 0;hasArticle2 = group hasArticle2 by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"saqlgroup\").asObject()}};hasArticle2 = foreach hasArticle2 generate \"With Articles\" as 'Cases',  avg('CSAT') as 'avg_CSAT', {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"query2\").asObject()}};noArticle2 = filter q2 by 'ArticleVersion' == 0;noArticle2 = group noArticle2 by  {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"saqlgroup\").asObject()}};noArticle2 = foreach noArticle2 generate \"Without Articles\" as 'Cases',  avg('CSAT') as 'avg_CSAT',  {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"query2\").asObject()}};u2 = union hasArticle2, noArticle2;u2 = order u2 by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"order\").asObject()}};co = group u by ({{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"order\").asObject()}}, 'Cases') full, u2 by ({{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"order\").asObject()}}, 'Cases');co = foreach co generate sum(u['avg_DurationCalculatedField']) as 'avg_DurationCalculatedField', sum(u2['avg_CSAT']) as 'avg_CSAT', {{cell(static_2.selection, 0, \"variable\").asObject()}}[{{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"order\").asObject()}}] as {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"order\").asObject()}}, {{cell(static_2.selection, 0, \"variable\").asObject()}}['Cases'] as 'Cases';","measures":["{{cell(static_2.selection, 0, \"value\").asObject()}}"],"autoFilter":true,"groups":["{{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"compactgroup\").asObject()}}","Cases"]}

{"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceCase>\"; q  = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"Current\").asDateRange(\"date('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month','ClosedDate_Day')\")}};  q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == \"true\" ; hasArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' > 0; c = group hasArticle by all, q by all; c = foreach c generate count(hasArticle)/count(q) as 'avg_AttachedRate';","measures":[["count","*","avg_AttachedRate"]],"autoFilter":true}

values: {"display":"Last 7 Days","Compact":[["day",-7],["day",0]],"Current":["7 days ago","current day"],"compactgroup":["ClosedDate_Year","ClosedDate_Month","ClosedDate_Day"],"query":"hasArticle['ClosedDate_Year'] + \"~~~\" + hasArticle['ClosedDate_Month'] + \"~~~\" + hasArticle['ClosedDate_Day'] as 'ClosedDate_Year~~~ClosedDate_Month~~~ClosedDate_Day'","saqlgroup":"('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month','ClosedDate_Day')","order":"'ClosedDate_Year~~~ClosedDate_Month~~~ClosedDate_Day'","query2":"'ClosedDate_Year' + \"~~~\" + 'ClosedDate_Month' + \"~~~\" + 'ClosedDate_Day' as 'ClosedDate_Year~~~ClosedDate_Month~~~ClosedDate_Day'"}

query.query: {"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceCase>\"; q = filter q by IsClosed==\"true\"; q = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"Current\").asDateRange(\"date('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month','ClosedDate_Day')\")}}; hasArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' > 0; hasArticle = group hasArticle by all; hasArticle = foreach hasArticle generate \"With Articles\" as 'Cases',  avg('DurationCalculatedField') as 'avg_CaseDuration'; noArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' == 0; noArticle = group noArticle by all; noArticle = foreach noArticle generate \"Without Articles\" as 'Cases',  avg('DurationCalculatedField') as 'avg_CaseDuration'; u = group hasArticle by all, noArticle by all; u = foreach u generate -(sum(hasArticle['avg_CaseDuration'])-sum(noArticle['avg_CaseDuration']))/sum(noArticle['avg_CaseDuration'])*100 as 'avg_Percent';","measures":[["count","Duration_in_Hours__c","avg_Percent"]],"autoFilter":true}

{"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceCase>\";\n q = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"Current\").asDateRange(\"date('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month','ClosedDate_Day')\")}}; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == \"true\" ;  hasArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' > 0; c = group hasArticle by 'Product_Family_KB__c', q by 'Product_Family_KB__c'; c = foreach c generate count(hasArticle)/count(q) as 'avg_AttachedRate', hasArticle['Product_Family_KB__c'] as 'Product_Family_KB__c'; c = order c by 'avg_AttachedRate' {{cell(static_1.selection, 0, \"value\").asString()}};","measures":[["count","*","avg_AttachedRate"]],"measuresMap":{},"autoFilter":true,"groups":["Product_Family_KB__c"]}

step_ValuesTable.query: q = load "<ServiceCase>"; q = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month','ClosedDate_Day')")}}; q = filter q by {{cell(Toggle_AttachedArticles.selection, 0, "saql").asObject()}}; q = foreach q generate 'CaseNumber', first('Account.Name') as 'Account.Name', first('CSAT__c') as 'CSAT__c', first('First_Contact_Close__c') as 'First_Contact_Close__c', first('Type') as 'Type', first('Owner.Name') as 'Owner.Name', first('MilestoneStatus') as 'MilestoneStatus', avg('Duration__c') as 'avg_Duration__c', first('Origin') as 'Origin', first('Priority') as 'Priority', first('Status') as 'Status', first('Type_of_Support__c') as 'Type_of_Support__c', first('IsEscalated') as 'Escalated'; q = limit q 100;

query.query: {"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceCase>\"; q = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"Current\").asDateRange(\"date('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month','ClosedDate_Day')\")}}; q = filter q by IsClosed==\"true\"; q = filter q by 'CSAT' > -10; hasArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' > 0; hasArticle = group hasArticle by all; hasArticle = foreach hasArticle generate \"With Articles\" as 'Cases',  avg('CSAT') as 'avg_CSAT'; noArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' == 0; noArticle = group noArticle by all; noArticle = foreach noArticle generate \"Without Articles\" as 'Cases',  avg('CSAT') as 'avg_CSAT'; u = group hasArticle by all, noArticle by all; u = foreach u generate (sum(hasArticle['avg_CSAT'])-sum(noArticle['avg_CSAT']))/sum(noArticle['avg_CSAT'])*100 as 'avg_Percent';","measures":[["avg","CSAT__c","avg_Percent"]],"autoFilter":true}

{"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceCase>\";\n q = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, \"Current\").asDateRange(\"date('ClosedDate_Year','ClosedDate_Month','ClosedDate_Day')\")}}; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == \"true\" ;  hasArticle = filter q by 'ArticleVersion' > 0;  c = group hasArticle by 'Reason', q by 'Reason'; c = foreach c generate count(hasArticle)/count(q)  as 'avg_AttachedRate', hasArticle['Reason'] as 'Reason'; c = order c by 'avg_AttachedRate' {{cell(static_1.selection, 0, \"value\").asString()}};","measures":[["count","*","avg_AttachedRate"]],"measuresMap":{},"autoFilter":true,"groups":["Reason"]}
